de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.writer
Class ASysLogWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.writer.ASysLogWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysComponent, ISysLogWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ASysFileWriter, CSysScreenWriter
public abstract class ASysLogWriter
extends Object
implements ISysLogWriter

The ASysLogWriter is a abstract implementation of the interface ISysLogWriter. It implements some of the methods of ISysComponent.
It also defines the useful method writerIsOpen and implements the method close of ISysLogWriter.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich, Torsten Knauft
